long_description: Great for intensive training or recreational riding, the SMP Stratos bike saddle offers a full-length center channel and a supportive shape. Long-lasting, abrasion-resistant full-grain leather cover ensures ultimate comfort and dependable performance through the miles. Saddle shape features a full-length central channel to help redistribute body weight off of sensitive areas; raised rear offers added support for pelvis. Foamed elastomer padding is strategically placed to add comfort. Stainless steel rails offer a sturdy and supportive platform. SMP Stratos saddle is well-suited for people with a narrow or medium-sized pelvis.
short_description: Great for intensive training or recreational riding, the SMP Stratos bike saddle offers a full-length center channel and a supportive shape.
